caseTitle: Azeem Khan v. Mujahid Khan & others
tagline: The Magistrate in order to record a confession has to essentially observe all mandatory precautions of section 364 read with section 164, Cr.P.C and High Court Rules & Orders. It cannot, at present, be held that the report of biochemical expert on DNA is an admissible piece of evidence in the absence of any sanction of law.
